SELECT EMG_REQ_ID, PAR_NAME, POINT, SAVED_DATE FROM EMG_POINT_SAVED_VIEW WHERE PR.PAR_NAME = #{par_name} ORDER BY Q.SAVED_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMG_POINT (EMG_POINT_ID, EMG_CONFIRMED_ID, POINT, POINT_SUBJECT, USED_TIME) SELECT #{emg_point_id} , #{emg_confirmed_id} , (Q.END_DATE - Q.START_DATE + 1) * (Q.END_TIME - Q.START_TIME) * 200 AS POINT , P.PAR_BACKUP_ID AS POINT_SUBJECT -- 포인트 적립 대상자 , (Q.END_DATE - Q.START_DATE + 1) * (Q.END_TIME - Q.START_TIME) AS USED_TIME FROM EMG_REQ Q JOIN EMG_CONFIRMED CF ON Q.EMG_REQ_ID = CF.EMG_REQ_ID JOIN CHILD_BACKUP C ON Q.CHILD_BACKUP_ID = C.CHILD_BACKUP_ID JOIN PAR_BACKUP P ON C.PAR_BACKUP_ID = P.PAR_BACKUP_ID WHERE CF.EMG_CONFIRMED_ID = #{emg_confirmed_id}
